page.title: 13People in Rhodes Minnis
page.content: Nearly every day people teach me something about things around me. My name is Kirsty Andrea Athow and I am 10 years old. I live at Longage Rise, Rhodes Minnis. I have riding lessons at a girl's house her name is Joanne Pierse. She taught me to jump and canter. My sister and I deliver the papers and newsletters, we have a lot of pleasure. We know a lady called Miss Carter. I go to see her when I deliver the news letters. Kerry, my sister is a baby sitter for a lady called Carol Williams. She has a little girl who rides on a horse that is not brokenin. The horse's name is Toffee, she has had two foals and I saw them being born.
